EmailTemplate.subject: Need some help? Check out Bigcommerce University!

Watch our quick videos hosted by ecommerce consultants to become an online selling expert.

Become an online selling expert at Bigcommerce University
Watch our short videos <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/University/Quick-Tour-of-Bigcommerce-Video]]> Expert advice at your fingertips
Each of our quick videos is hosted by ecommerce experts Katey and James, and covers need-to-know topics like how to launch your store, attract shoppers, improve website conversion and build customer loyalty.
